column4: I am trying to launch a program from the terminal but it wont do.. some programs work but this not.. can someone look at log and point me in the right direction? pls http://pastebin.ca/2107606
are you in X?
putty
well you're trying to launch a graphical application
i am using x on the linux computer that i am using.. as u can see i can launch skype
yes, i want to.. on my htpc
but it does not allow me
you launch skype and it shows up where?
no where apparently
:D where do you want qbittorrent to appear?
on the htpc.. so that I can use the remote gui
i want to launch the torrent program so that I can access its web gui when I want to
and then close it down
you want it to appear on the server (the linux machine) or on the client (the windows machine)?
the linux machine.. I'm well indulged with the xming/x11 forwarding but I haven't tried launching things on the server via the commando prompt
what does the following command return: echo $DISPLAY
echo $DISPLAY
its blank
set it to ':0'
your thinking about export DISPLAY=:0?
yes
would probarbly have solved it myself after a few hours of grmphing but thanks for guiding me in the right direction, works fine.
no problem
